sqlMap.select: SELECT B.COMMENTS COLUMN_NM FROM DBA_TAB_COLUMNS A, DBA_COL_COMMENTS B WHERE A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.TABLE_NAME = 'TB_STAT_USE' AND B.TABLE_NAME = 'TB_STAT_USE' AND A.COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%CNT' AND B.COMMENTS NOT IN('시계열사용수')

SELECT (SELECT CATE_NM FROM TB_OPEN_CATE WHERE CATE_ID = B.TOP_CATE_ID) TOP_CATE_NM ,B.CATE_NM ,A.CATE_ID ,SUM(A.TOT_USE_CNT) TOT_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.S_USE_CNT) S_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.C_USE_CNT) C_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.M_USE_CNT) M_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.F_USE_CNT) F_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.L_USE_CNT) L_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.A_USE_CNT) A_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.V_USE_CNT) V_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.EXCEL_CNT) EXCEL_CNT ,SUM(A.CSV_CNT) CSV_CNT ,SUM(A.JSON_CNT) JSON_CNT ,SUM(A.XML_CNT) XML_CNT ,SUM(A.TXT_CNT) TXT_CNT ,SUM(A.FILE_USE_CNT) FILE_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.LINK_USE_CNT) LINK_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.API_USE_CNT) API_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.APIS_USE_CNT) APIS_USE_CNT FROM TB_STAT_USE A ,TB_OPEN_CATE B WHERE A.CATE_ID= B.CATE_ID AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY B.CATE_NM,A.CATE_ID,B.TOP_CATE_ID ORDER BY TOP_CATE_NM, B.CATE_NM

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT CATE_NM FROM TB_OPEN_CATE WHERE CATE_ID = B.TOP_CATE_ID) TOP_CATE_NM FROM TB_STAT_OPEN A ,TB_OPEN_CATE B WHERE A.CATE_ID= B.CATE_ID GROUP BY B.CATE_NM,A.CATE_ID,B.TOP_CATE_ID ORDER BY TOP_CATE_NM

SELECT SUM(C.S_USE_CNT) S_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.C_USE_CNT) C_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.M_USE_CNT) M_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.F_USE_CNT) F_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.L_USE_CNT) L_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.A_USE_CNT) A_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.V_USE_CNT) V_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.EXCEL_CNT) EXCEL_CNT ,SUM(C.CSV_CNT) CSV_CNT ,SUM(C.JSON_CNT) JSON_CNT ,SUM(C.XML_CNT) XML_CNT ,SUM(C.TXT_CNT) TXT_CNT ,SUM(C.FILE_USE_CNT) FILE_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.LINK_USE_CNT) LINK_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.API_USE_CNT) API_USE_CNT ,SUM(C.APIS_USE_CNT) APIS_USE_CNT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT CATE_NM FROM TB_OPEN_CATE WHERE CATE_ID = B.TOP_CATE_ID) TOP_CATE_NM ,B.TOP_CATE_ID ,SUM(A.S_USE_CNT) S_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.C_USE_CNT) C_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.M_USE_CNT) M_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.F_USE_CNT) F_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.L_USE_CNT) L_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.A_USE_CNT) A_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.V_USE_CNT) V_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.EXCEL_CNT) EXCEL_CNT ,SUM(A.CSV_CNT) CSV_CNT ,SUM(A.JSON_CNT) JSON_CNT ,SUM(A.XML_CNT) XML_CNT ,SUM(A.TXT_CNT) TXT_CNT ,SUM(A.FILE_USE_CNT) FILE_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.LINK_USE_CNT) LINK_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.API_USE_CNT) API_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.APIS_USE_CNT) APIS_USE_CNT FROM TB_STAT_USE A ,TB_OPEN_CATE B WHERE A.CATE_ID= B.CATE_ID AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY B.CATE_NM,A.CATE_ID,B.TOP_CATE_ID ) C GROUP BY C.TOP_CATE_ID, TOP_CATE_NM ORDER BY TOP_CATE_NM

SELECT B.ORG_NM ,A.ORG_CD ,SUM(A.TOT_USE_CNT) TOT_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.S_USE_CNT) S_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.C_USE_CNT) C_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.M_USE_CNT) M_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.F_USE_CNT) F_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.L_USE_CNT) L_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.A_USE_CNT) A_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.V_USE_CNT) V_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.EXCEL_CNT) EXCEL_CNT ,SUM(A.CSV_CNT) CSV_CNT ,SUM(A.JSON_CNT) JSON_CNT ,SUM(A.XML_CNT) XML_CNT ,SUM(A.TXT_CNT) TXT_CNT ,SUM(A.FILE_USE_CNT) FILE_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.LINK_USE_CNT) LINK_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.API_USE_CNT) API_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.APIS_USE_CNT) APIS_USE_CNT
FROM TB_STAT_USE A ,TB_COMM_ORG B WHERE A.ORG_CD= B.ORG_CD AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY B.ORG_NM,A.ORG_CD

SELECT B.ORG_NM FROM TB_STAT_USE A ,TB_COMM_ORG B WHERE A.ORG_CD= B.ORG_CD
GROUP BY B.ORG_NM,A.ORG_CD

SELECT SUM(A.TOT_USE_CNT) TOT_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.S_USE_CNT) S_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.C_USE_CNT) C_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.M_USE_CNT) M_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.F_USE_CNT) F_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.L_USE_CNT) L_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.A_USE_CNT) A_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.V_USE_CNT) V_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.EXCEL_CNT) EXCEL_CNT ,SUM(A.CSV_CNT) CSV_CNT ,SUM(A.JSON_CNT) JSON_CNT ,SUM(A.XML_CNT) XML_CNT ,SUM(A.TXT_CNT) TXT_CNT ,SUM(A.FILE_USE_CNT) FILE_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.LINK_USE_CNT) LINK_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.API_USE_CNT) API_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.APIS_USE_CNT) APIS_USE_CNT
FROM TB_STAT_USE A ,TB_COMM_ORG B WHERE A.ORG_CD= B.ORG_CD AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY B.ORG_NM,A.ORG_CD

SELECT A.INF_ID "infId" , (SELECT CATE_NM FROM TB_OPEN_CATE WHERE CATE_ID = C.TOP_CATE_ID) "cateNmTop" , C.CATE_NM "cateNm" , B.INF_NM "infNm" , SUM(TOT_USE_CNT) "totUseCnt" , SUM(S_USE_CNT + C_USE_CNT + M_USE_CNT + F_USE_CNT + L_USE_CNT + A_USE_CNT + V_USE_CNT) "totViewCnt" , SUM(S_USE_CNT) "sUseCnt" , SUM(C_USE_CNT) "cUseCnt" , SUM(M_USE_CNT) "mUseCnt" , SUM(F_USE_CNT) "fUseCnt" , SUM(L_USE_CNT) "lUseCnt" , SUM(A_USE_CNT) "aUseCnt" , SUM(V_USE_CNT) "vUseCnt" , SUM(EXCEL_CNT + CSV_CNT + JSON_CNT + XML_CNT + TXT_CNT) "totDownCnt" , SUM(EXCEL_CNT) "excelCnt" , SUM(CSV_CNT) "csvCnt" , SUM(JSON_CNT) "jsonCnt" , SUM(XML_CNT) "xmlCnt" , SUM(TXT_CNT) "txtCnt" , SUM(FILE_USE_CNT) "fileUseCnt" , SUM(LINK_USE_CNT) "linkUseCnt" , SUM(API_USE_CNT) "apiUseCnt" , SUM(APIS_USE_CNT) "apisUseCnt" FROM TB_STAT_USE A , TB_OPEN_INF B , TB_OPEN_CATE C WHERE A.INF_ID = B.INF_ID AND B.CATE_ID = C.CATE_ID AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR#
AND UPPER(B.INF_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#infNm#) || '%'
AND C.TOP_CATE_ID = #cateId#
GROUP BY B.INF_NM , A.INF_ID , C.CATE_NM , C.TOP_CATE_ID ORDER BY 5 DESC

SELECT MAX(A.INF_ID) "infId" , C.CATE_NM "cateNm" , MAX(B.INF_NM) "infNm" , SUM(TOT_USE_CNT) "totUseCnt" , SUM(S_USE_CNT + C_USE_CNT + M_USE_CNT + F_USE_CNT + L_USE_CNT + A_USE_CNT + V_USE_CNT) "totViewCnt" , SUM(S_USE_CNT) "sUseCnt" , SUM(C_USE_CNT) "cUseCnt" , SUM(M_USE_CNT) "mUseCnt" , SUM(F_USE_CNT) "fUseCnt" , SUM(L_USE_CNT) "lUseCnt" , SUM(A_USE_CNT) "aUseCnt" , SUM(V_USE_CNT) "vUseCnt" , SUM(EXCEL_CNT + CSV_CNT + JSON_CNT + XML_CNT + TXT_CNT) "totDownCnt" , SUM(EXCEL_CNT) "excelCnt" , SUM(CSV_CNT) "csvCnt" , SUM(JSON_CNT) "jsonCnt" , SUM(XML_CNT) "xmlCnt" , SUM(TXT_CNT) "txtCnt" , SUM(FILE_USE_CNT) "fileUseCnt" , SUM(LINK_USE_CNT) "linkUseCnt" , SUM(API_USE_CNT) "apiUseCnt" , SUM(APIS_USE_CNT) "apisUseCnt" FROM TB_STAT_USE A , TB_OPEN_INF B , TB_OPEN_CATE C WHERE A.INF_ID = B.INF_ID AND B.CATE_ID = C.CATE_ID AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR#
AND UPPER(B.INF_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#infNm#) || '%'
AND C.TOP_CATE_ID = #cateId#
GROUP BY C.CATE_NM ORDER BY 5 DESC

SELECT DECODE(C.CONT_SITE_CD, '01', '네이버', '02', '다음', '03', '카카오톡', '04', '구글', '05', '페이스북' ,'06', '트위터', '') AS "siteNm" ,C.USER_NM "userNm" ,B.ACT_KEY "actKey" ,A.API_RES_P "apiResP" ,D.INF_NM "infnm" ,A.DN_TYPE "dnType" ,A.REQ_CNT "reqCnt" ,A.ROW_CNT "rowCnt" ,A.LEADTIME "lendtime" ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24' || ':' || 'MI' || ':' || 'SS') AS "regDttm" FROM TB_LOG_OPEN_INF_A A INNER JOIN TB_USER_KEY B ON A.USER_CD = B.USER_CD AND A.KEY_SEQ = B.KEY_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_USER C ON A.USER_CD = C.USER_CD INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF D ON A.INF_ID = D.INF_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.REG_DTTM >= TO_DATE('20150923', 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.REG_DTTM >= TO_DATE(#pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR#, 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.REG_DTTM < TO_DATE(#pubDttmTo:VARCHAR#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1
AND UPPER(D.INF_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#infNm#) || '%'
ORDER BY A.REG_DTTM DESC

SELECT C.CATE_NM FROM TB_STAT_USE A , TB_OPEN_INF B , TB_OPEN_CATE C WHERE A.INF_ID = B.INF_ID AND B.CATE_ID = C.CATE_ID AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR#
AND UPPER(B.INF_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#infNm#) || '%'
AND C.TOP_CATE_ID = #cateId#
GROUP BY C.CATE_NM ORDER BY C.CATE_NM

SELECT SUM(A.TOT_USE_CNT) TOT_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.S_USE_CNT) S_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.C_USE_CNT) C_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.M_USE_CNT) M_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.F_USE_CNT) F_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.L_USE_CNT) L_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.A_USE_CNT) A_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.V_USE_CNT) V_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.EXCEL_CNT) EXCEL_CNT ,SUM(A.CSV_CNT) CSV_CNT ,SUM(A.JSON_CNT) JSON_CNT ,SUM(A.XML_CNT) XML_CNT ,SUM(A.TXT_CNT) TXT_CNT ,SUM(A.FILE_USE_CNT) FILE_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.LINK_USE_CNT) LINK_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.API_USE_CNT) API_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.APIS_USE_CNT) APIS_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.C_USE_CNT) CATALOG_USE_CNT ,SUM(A.V_USE_CNT) VISUAL_USE_CNT FROM TB_STAT_USE A , TB_OPEN_INF B , TB_OPEN_CATE C WHERE A.INF_ID = B.INF_ID AND B.CATE_ID = C.CATE_ID AND A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #pubDttmFrom:VARCHAR# AND #pubDttmTo:VARCHAR#
AND UPPER(B.INF_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#infNm#) || '%'
AND C.TOP_CATE_ID = #cateId#
GROUP BY C.CATE_NM ORDER BY C.CATE_NM
